name: Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided
notes:
This will install SWG from your CD or iso image, then will download the SWGEmu launcher. 
When the installation is finished, start the game and in the launcher's window, go to the menu: Settings > Install from SWG. 
Tip: you can get the SWG folder by using the Browse Files action from the game's context menu (right-click) in Lutris.

files.game: N/A:Select setup.exe from Star Wars Galaxies install disk

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/StarWarsGalaxies/SWGEmuLaunchpad
files:
- game: N/A:Select setup.exe from Star Wars Galaxies install disk
- swgemu: http://launchpad2.net/SWGEmuLaunchpad_ubuntu_x86_64.tar.gz
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: game
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/StarWarsGalaxies/
    file: swgemu
